description:
New anime project for MECHA-UDE, as a full-fledged anime series.

Long ago, alien lifeforms came to Earth, fusing with people on the planet. Due to their appearance, they were dubbed "Mecha-ude," as when fused, they bore a striking resemblance to mechanized limbs.

Through an involuntary partnership, average middle schooler Hikaru Amatsuga works alongside the Mecha-ude Arma, who is an extremely rare and special existence. To protect Arma, the resistance group ARMS assigns the dual Mecha-ude user Aki Murasame to follow him wherever he goes. However, she is also looking for a mysterious Snake-Type Mecha-ude wielder, who has put many of her comrades in a critical state.

Behind the scenes, an organization known as the Kagami Group is searching for the mythical "Trigger Arm," a Mecha-ude said to grant unlimited power. When Aki's life is threatened by this group, Hikaru must team up with Arma to find the courage to fight back and, along the way, learn that his life will never be ordinary again.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: メカウデ-mechanical arms- (新アニメ)

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Cyborg
tags.description: Prominently features a human character whose physiological functions are aided or enhanced by artificial means.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

node.description:
[Website](http://okamotics.com/) | [Profile (TriF Studio)](http://www.trifstudio.com/#6) |  [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/teamokamoto) | [Tumblr](https://okamotics.tumblr.com/) | [pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/726170)

A Japanese director, character designer, illustrator and animator. She premiered her first independent animation "11:08" online, and it garnered 848,000+ views. This began her path of turning animation into her work. She is currently a member of TriF Studio, a creative team based in Fukuoka.

__Awards__:
  Winner of the Miyagi/Sendai Prefecture Animation Grand Prix 2018 for "Saishukai no Uta" Music Video
  Winner of the Cannes Film Festival 2015 Poster Award for "SUSHI POLICE"

(Source: MECHA-UDE website)

Hiroshi Matsuyama (松山洋) is the president of CyberConnect2 and the director of Project .hack and .hack Conglomerate. He is one of the strongest influences behind the .hack series, not only leading the project but making numerous artistic contributions himself, such as the creation of Grunties. He has inserted himself into the world of .hack as the characters Piros and Piros the 3rd, and lended his voice to the .hack//G.U. GAME MUSIC O.S.T.s.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/piroshi_cc2)

[Website](http://okamotics.com/) | [Profile (TriF Studio)](http://www.trifstudio.com/#6) |  [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/teamokamoto) | [Tumblr](https://okamotics.tumblr.com/) | [pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/726170)

A Japanese director, character designer, illustrator and animator. She premiered her first independent animation "11:08" online, and it garnered 848,000+ views. This began her path of turning animation into her work. She is currently a member of TriF Studio, a creative team based in Fukuoka.

__Awards__:
  Winner of the Miyagi/Sendai Prefecture Animation Grand Prix 2018 for "Saishukai no Uta" Music Video
  Winner of the Cannes Film Festival 2015 Poster Award for "SUSHI POLICE"

(Source: MECHA-UDE website)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [mangaka](https://anilist.co/staff/256771/)._

[1st Twitter](https://twitter.com/NishiiTerumi) | [2nd Twitter](https://twitter.com/Nishiiterumi1) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/teruminishii.bsky.social) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRVXG5v77o6zvzBxb9NxffQ) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/terumi_nishii/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=17680136) | [Website](http://studio-meiris.com/)

Initially wanting to become a mangaka, it wasn't until while studying at Osaka Designers' College that Ishii thought about becoming an animator after having seen [Revolutionary Girl Utena](https://anilist.co/anime/440/), a show directed by [Kunihiko Ikuhara](https://anilist.co/staff/100082/). Shortly thereafter a re-telling movie for the series was announced and Nishii set her sights on being part of the production. After graduating she joined Studio Cockpit and managed to make her debut on the film as an in-betweener.

In 2011, she made her debut as a character designer on [Penguindrum](https://anilist.co/anime/10721/), another show of Ikuhara's.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kohta_yamabook) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yamabook_kohta/) | [Website](https://www.kohtayamamoto.net/)

Formerly affiliated with Legendoor, he is now in business partnership with VV-ALKLINE.

[Website](http://www.sawanohiroyuki.com/) | [Website (nZk)](http://www.sh-nzk.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sawano_nZk) | [Instagram (Official)](https://www.instagram.com/hiroyukisawano.official/) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/sawano__hiroyuki/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/SawanoHiroyukiSMEJ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0Riv2KnFcLZA3JSVryRg4y?si=KaE_XDXqSRewfXXsxBNzoA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/hiroyuki-sawano/156620523) | [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/artist/1315147) 

Composer and musician represented by VV-ALKLINE since 2017. He was previously with Legendoor from 2006 to 2017. 
Sawano began practicing the piano at an early age, and studied composition, arrangement, orchestration, and piano under Nobuchika Tsuboi from the age of 17.

Active as a composer since 2004, he first gained recognition for his work on the Team Medical Dragon TV drama in 2006. He made his debut as an anime composer in 2006 on [Soul Link](https://anilist.co/anime/854/). In 2009, he released his first solo album *musica*, which included some of his more popular songs done for TV shows. In 2014, he launched a new vocal song project under the name "SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]", producing the first album *UnChild* with [Aimer](https://anilist.co/staff/107859/) as the vocalist under the name SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]:Aimer. Since then his songs under this vocal song project have also been used as the opening and ending themes for various anime.

He has cited [Joe Hisaishi](https://anilist.co/staff/100738/), [Youko Kanno](https://anilist.co/staff/95508/), [Hans Zimmer](https://anilist.co/staff/104669/) and Danny Elfman as major inspirations.

Non-anime role:

• **Xenoblade Chronicles X (music)** 
• **Xenoblade Chronicles X Definitive Edition (music)**
**Shouta Kawamura** is a CGI & VFX creator employed at TriF Studio.

[Website](http://www.sawanohiroyuki.com/) | [Website (nZk)](http://www.sh-nzk.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sawano_nZk) | [Instagram (Official)](https://www.instagram.com/hiroyukisawano.official/) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/sawano__hiroyuki/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/SawanoHiroyukiSMEJ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0Riv2KnFcLZA3JSVryRg4y?si=KaE_XDXqSRewfXXsxBNzoA) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/hiroyuki-sawano/156620523) | [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/artist/1315147)

Non-anime role:

• **Xenoblade Chronicles X (music)** 
• **Xenoblade Chronicles X Definitive Edition (music)**

__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/theshoefactory2) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/benjamin_dj_anderson/)

__Benjamin Anderson__ is an English vocalist and lyricist living in Japan known to frequently collaborate with [Hiroyuki Sawano](https://anilist.co/staff/103509/Hiroyuki-Sawano) in his vocal project SawanoHiroyuki[nZk].

__Residency:__ Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Keio University

__[Website](http://www.ksp-songs.com/canon.html) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/can0stagram/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kanon.yamamoto)__

__Kanon Yamamoto__, better known as Canon. (stylized as cAnON.) is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and vocalist.

Daughter of __[Kenji Yamamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/223536)__.
